channel.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Canned]
channel.description:
### Light Arc: A Magical and Rose Coloured Junior High School Life!
It was springtime! The perfect time for meeting new friends, preparing for the new academic year, and familiarise yourself with your new school and classes! The new students orientation went up smoothly, and classes had been going on for a week.
But today, on the sunny Wednesday, all students were gathered in the gymnasium for... a safety seminar!
The increasing number of night assaults and traffic accident had pushed the school to raise awareness about public safety. And it was mandatory for everyone to attend. Only...
No one seemed to be seating on the first row of chairs for some reason.
______ *This RP will start with the characters joining a safety seminar. You are free to interact and roam around for a while until the seminar begins.*
